parameters.query: INSERT INTO scheduled_posts_queue (post_id, user_id, content, platforms, media_urls, scheduled_for, status, created_at) VALUES ($1, $2, $3, $4, $5, $6, 'pending', NOW()) ON CONFLICT (post_id) DO UPDATE SET content = $3, platforms = $4, media_urls = $5, scheduled_for = $6, status = 'pending', updated_at = NOW()
SELECT spq.*, get_user_oauth_credentials(spq.user_id) as oauth_credentials FROM scheduled_posts_queue spq WHERE spq.status = 'pending' AND spq.scheduled_for <= NOW()
UPDATE scheduled_posts_queue SET status = 'processing', updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = $1
UPDATE scheduled_posts_queue SET status = $2, platform_post_ids = $3, error_message = $4, completed_at = CASE WHEN $2 = 'completed' THEN NOW() ELSE NULL END, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = $1
